All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Board
Responsible for drawing the primary Ludo board to the window and handling board-related logic.
Dice
This class is responsible to roll the dice and can roll it as many times as you want!
Main
 
Menu
 
Pawn
Responsible for creating pawn objects for each player, which can be moved around the board onto different spots.
Spot
Responsible for drawing rectangular and circular spots onto the board to support pawn movement.
